subtitle: its sources, history and text, together with its amendments to the Interstate commece act, explained, analyzed, and compared; comprising extracts from reports and debates in Congress, rulings, interpretations, and decisions of the Interstate commerce commission, opinions of the United States Supreme court, prescribed forms, and complete texts of related acts, including the Federal control act, Merchant marine act, 1920, and Interstate commerce act, all as amended to and including August 18, 1922
series: American business series, R. C. McCrea, general editor
title: The transportation act, 1920

notes.value: "An act to amend section 206 of the Transportation act, 1920": 1 leaf inserted between pages 60 and 61.
